timeline.title: Rolling Recruitment Windows
timeline.description: Submit your profile and we will route it to the right wing in under 72 hours.

timeline.title: Squad Conversations
timeline.description: Meet wing leads for focused chats about your skills, goals, and preferred teams.

timeline.title: Shadow Sprints
timeline.description: Join active missions with mentors so you can learn the operating rhythm on the job.

timeline.title: Launch Reviews
timeline.description: Showcase progress, ship demos, and plan the next wave of projects with the core council.

impact.title: Members publish research
impact.description: More than three quarters of active researchers submit work to journals, conferences, or tech blogs every season.

impact.title: Ship production code
impact.description: Engineers push code that reaches real users inside and outside the campus within their first two quarters.

impact.title: Lead major events
impact.description: Event specialists own flagship conferences, hackathons, and workshops with cross-campus partners.

questions.question: When does recruitment close?
questions.answer: NSA operates on rolling cohorts now. Submit whenever you're ready and expect an update from the council within 72 hours.

questions.question: Do I need to be a CS student to join NSA?
questions.answer: NSA welcomes students from every NUST school. Diverse disciplines strengthen our AI work, so engineering, business, design, and biosciences students are encouraged to apply.

questions.question: Can first-year students participate?
questions.answer: Yes. We actively recruit freshmen and sophomores so they can learn, contribute, and grow into leadership roles throughout their time at NUST.

questions.question: What's the selection process?
questions.answer: Submit the Google Form, pass a skills and motivation screening, complete a 15-20 minute interview, and receive results within 48 hours of the conversation.

questions.question: What do NSA members work on?
questions.answer: Members ship AI products, run research experiments, craft design systems, and lead operations for large-scale events and partnerships across NUST.

directorates.name: Engineering Directorate
directorates.description: Transforms ambitious briefs into resilient products, services, and tools.

directorates.name: Research Directorate
directorates.description: Runs experimentation pipelines, model evaluations, and technical write-ups.

directorates.name: Design Directorate
directorates.description: Crafts the visual language for every product, deck, and experience.

directorates.name: Marketing Directorate
directorates.description: Amplifies missions, leads campaigns, and nurtures community stories.

directorates.name: Operations Directorate
directorates.description: Keeps logistics, security, and event execution aligned with the mission clock.

directorates.name: Strategy Directorate
directorates.description: Aligns resources, partnerships, and long-term roadmaps for every wing.

portfolios.name: Team Human Resources
portfolios.description: Builds culture, onboarding, and member growth journeys.

portfolios.name: Team Security and Logistics
portfolios.description: Protects venues, manages access, and aligns on-ground execution.

portfolios.name: Team Event Management
portfolios.description: Designs unforgettable experiences from brief to breakdown.

portfolios.name: Team Admin Events
portfolios.description: Owns permissions, space bookings, and partner coordination.

portfolios.name: Team Liaison
portfolios.description: Connects NSA squads with external mentors, startups, and partners.

portfolios.name: Team Publications
portfolios.description: Documents wins, research, and member spotlights for the network.

portfolios.name: Team Graphics
portfolios.description: Turns complex ideas into expressive visuals and motion.

portfolios.name: Team Media
portfolios.description: Captures moments, produces recaps, and runs post-event storytelling.

portfolios.name: Team SMM
portfolios.description: Curates social conversations and sparks interest across channels.

portfolios.name: Team ER and Sponsorship

portfolios.name: Team Finance

portfolios.name: Team Decor
portfolios.description: Shapes immersive atmospheres that match the energy of each launch.

portfolios.name: Team Marketing
portfolios.description: Keeps the NSA story consistent across every touchpoint.

portfolios.name: Unit Software Development
portfolios.description: Ships full-stack products, internal tools, and integrations.

portfolios.name: Unit Computer Vision
portfolios.description: Builds perception systems, pipelines, and applied CV demos.

portfolios.name: Unit Deep Learning
portfolios.description: Runs model training, optimization, and evaluators.

portfolios.name: Unit Enthusiasts

portfolios.name: Unit Gen AI

portfolios.name: Unit R and D
portfolios.description: Maps long-term AI investments, grants, and research collaborations.

social_widgets.email_note: Your note arrives directly in the NSA inbox. Expect a reply within 24 hours.
social_widgets.github_note: Open-source drops are staged. Watch this space for launch repos.
social_widgets.twitter_note: Follow for live event coverage, callouts, and member spotlights.
